about.summary: Define a command-line interface by just giving it a description in the specific format.
Define a command-line interface by just giving it a description in the specific format.

name: r-docopt
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.7.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-docopt
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/docopt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/docopt/docopt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9f473887e4607e9b21fd4ab02e802858d0ac2ca6dad9e357a9d884a47fe4b0ff

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('docopt')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('docopt')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/docopt/docopt.R
  license: MIT
  summary: Define a command-line interface by just giving it a description in the specific format.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: docopt
# Type: Package
# Title: Command-Line Interface Specification Language
# Version: 0.7.1
# Author: Edwin de Jonge (edwindjonge@gmail.com)
# Maintainer: Edwin de Jonge <edwindjonge@gmail.com>
# Description: Define a command-line interface by just giving it a description in the specific format.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/docopt/docopt.R
# BugReports: https://github.com/docopt/docopt.R/issues
# Imports: methods
# Suggests: testthat
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-06-23 18:38:08 UTC; edwindj
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-06-24 08:50:03 UTC
